com.wealdtech.hawk

Class HawkCredentials.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wealdtech.hawk.HawkCredentials.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    HawkCredentials

    public static class HawkCredentials.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    Builder class to create a set of Hawk credentials.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HawkCredentials.Builder()
      Start a new builder.
      HawkCredentials.Builder(HawkCredentials prior)
      Start a new builder, initializing the values with those from an existing set of credentials.
